data.lyric:
[ti:One Man Band]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Old Dominion]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Man Band - Old Dominion
[00:04.25]Lyrics by：Trevor Rosen/Matthew Ramsey/Brad Tursi/Josh Osborne
[00:08.50]Composed by：Trevor Rosen/Matthew Ramsey/Brad Tursi/Josh Osborne
[00:12.75]Been flying solo for so long
[00:15.94]Nobody's singing a harmony
[00:19.13]Up there just me and my shadow
[00:22.24]No base no guitar no tambourine
[00:25.70]And I found you like a melody
[00:28.88]You were singing in the same key as me
[00:32.03]We had 'em dancing in the streets
[00:33.76]I don't wanna be a one man band
[00:36.87]I don't wanna be a rolling stone alone
[00:40.38]Putting miles on a run-down van
[00:43.18]Baby we can take our own show on the road
[00:46.74]I'll lay down the beat you'll carry the tune
[00:49.93]We'll get tattoos and we'll trash hotel rooms
[00:53.65]Baby take my hand
[00:55.87]I don't wanna be a one man band
[01:09.89]I wanna run down your wild dreams
[01:12.89]And I wanna chase every high with you
[01:15.99]Count every rip in these old jeans
[01:19.11]We'll never learn how to sing the blues
[01:22.63]If I'm gonna be famous
[01:25.79]Girl I wanna be famous with you
[01:28.99]We got our own little groove
[01:30.98]I don't wanna be a one man band
[01:33.66]I don't wanna be a rolling stone alone
[01:37.00]Putting miles on a run-down van
[01:40.01]Baby we can take our own show on the road
[01:43.44]I'll lay down the beat you'll carry the tune
[01:46.69]We'll get tattoos and we'll trash hotel rooms
[01:50.32]Baby take my hand
[01:52.41]'Cause I don't wanna be a one man band
[02:05.35]When the spotlight goes cold and the curtains come down
[02:08.81]The chairs are all stacked and there's no one around
[02:11.92]And nobody's payin' we'll still be playin'
[02:18.29]I don't wanna be a one man band
[02:21.19]I don't wanna be a rolling stone alone
[02:24.43]Putting miles on a run-down van
[02:27.43]Baby we can take our own show on the road
[02:30.72]I'll lay down the beat you'll carry the tune
[02:34.03]We'll get tattoos and we'll trash hotel rooms
[02:37.94]Baby take my hand
[02:39.98]'Cause I don't wanna be a one man band
[02:46.34]I don't wanna be a one man band
data.trans:
[ti:One Man Band]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Old Dominion]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.25]//
[00:08.50]//
[00:12.75]一直以来 独自闯荡
[00:15.94]没有人为我唱和
[00:19.13]只有孤影与我作伴
[00:22.24]没有贝斯 吉他 手鼓等伴奏
[00:25.70]我发现你就像一段旋律
[00:28.88]和我唱着同一个音调
[00:32.03]让人们在大街上跳起舞来
[00:33.76]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[00:36.87]我不想一个人四处流浪
[00:40.38]开着一辆破旧的货车到处奔波
[00:43.18]宝贝 我们可以在旅途中策划巡演
[00:46.74]我来打节拍 你来为我唱和
[00:49.93]我们去纹身 在酒店房间里狂欢
[00:53.65]宝贝 牵着我的手
[00:55.87]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[01:09.89]我想和你一起追逐狂野的梦想
[01:12.89]我想和你一起追逐幸福的时刻
[01:15.99]数数这条破旧的牛仔裤有多少个洞
[01:19.11]我们永远不会唱伤感的布鲁斯
[01:22.63]如果我出名了
[01:25.79]女孩 我想和你一起名扬四海
[01:28.99]我们有着自己的音乐风格
[01:30.98]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[01:33.66]我不想一个人四处流浪
[01:37.00]开着一辆破旧的货车到处奔波
[01:40.01]宝贝 我们可以在旅途中策划巡演
[01:43.44]我来打节拍 你来为我唱和
[01:46.69]我们去纹身 在酒店房间里狂欢
[01:50.32]宝贝 牵着我的手
[01:52.41]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[02:05.35]就算聚光灯变暗 帷幕落下
[02:08.81]观众早已散场 四周无人
[02:11.92]就算没有收入 我们依然为音乐坚持
[02:18.29]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[02:21.19]我不想一个人四处流
[02:24.43]开着一辆破旧的货车到处奔波
[02:27.43]宝贝 我们可以在旅途中策划巡演
[02:30.72]我来打节拍 你来为我唱和
[02:34.03]我们去纹身 在酒店房间里狂欢
[02:37.94]宝贝 牵着我的手
[02:39.98]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
[02:46.34]我不希望这个乐队只有我一个人
